N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 71.2 - Experience requirements

State Regulations
(a) The applicant shall submit satisfactory evidence of at least three years'
experience as a full-time verbatim shorthand reporter using either manual
shorthand or shorthand writing machine. (b) In lieu of the professional study and
experience requirements, five years of experience as a full-time verbatim
shorthand reporter acceptable to the State Board for Certified Shorthand

Reporting may be accepted by the department. Notes
